title: Planted Tikka Masala
instructions: Cut the planted into bite-sized pieces. Marinate in plant-based yogurt mixed with garam masala, turmeric, cumin, and chili powder for at least 30 minutes.
Thread the marinated pieces onto skewers. Grill or pan-fry until charred and cooked through, about 4-5 minutes per side.
For the masala sauce: saut√© diced onions until golden. Add garlic, ginger, and tomato paste. Cook for 2 minutes.
Add canned crushed tomatoes, garam masala, paprika, cumin, and coriander. Simmer for 15 minutes.
Stir in coconut cream and a touch of sugar to balance acidity. Simmer for another 5 minutes until creamy.
Add the grilled planted pieces to the sauce and heat through.
Garnish with fresh cilantro and serve with basmati rice and warm naan bread.
